flexed 0.7.0

StyleGuide

bem grid utility variables

utility

color() function

Function to get color of a shade from color-map. This mixin inserts font-face declarations for custom fonts.

@function color(
  $color,
  $shade
) { /* ... */ }

Example

.example-el {
    background: color(m, lighter); // base monochrome
    color: color(b); // base blue
}

Output

.example-el {
    background: #dfdfdf;
    color: #00abde;
}

z-index() function

Function to get z-index values based on layer names. This mixin inserts font-face declarations for custom fonts.

@function z-index(
  $layer
) { /* ... */ }

Example

.example-el {
    z-index: z-index(bump); // 10
}

Output

.example-el {
    z-index: 10;
}

border-radius() mixin

Mixin to create border radius for an element. This mixin creates border radius for an element. Radius can be specified as a single radius or as top-left, top-right, bottom-right, bottom-left

@mixin border-radius(
  $border-radius: 6px
) { /* ... */ }

Example

.foo {
  @include border-radius(10px);
}

Output

.foo {
  border-radius: 10px;
}

Example

.bar {
  @include border-radius(0, 10px, 15px, 20px);
}

Output

.bar {
  border-top-left-radius: 0px;
  border-top-right-radius: 10px;
  border-bottom-right-radius: 15px;
  border-bottom-left-radius: 20px;
}

border() mixin

Mixin to create border for an element. This mixin creates border for an element. Sides can be specified as top, right, bottom, left

@mixin border(
  $border: 1px solid #000
) { /* ... */ }

Example

.foo {
  @include border(1px solid #333);
}

Output

.foo {
  border: 1px solid  #333;
}

Example

.bar {
  @include border(1px solid  #333, top bottom);
}

Output

.bar {
  border-top: 1px solid  #333;
  border-bottom: 1px solid  #333;
}

center() mixin

Mixin to center an absolutely positioned element. This mixin centers an absolutely positioned element within its parents.

@mixin center(
  $direction
) { /* ... */ }

Example

.foo {
  @include center(both);
}

Output

.foo {
  top: 50%;
  left: 50%
  transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
}

clearfix() mixin

Provides an easy way to include a clearfix for containing floats.

@mixin clearfix { /* ... */ }
.element {
  @include clearfix;
}
.element::after {
  clear: both;
  content: "";
  display: block;
}

font-face() mixin

Mixin for custom fonts. This mixin inserts font-face declarations for custom fonts.

@mixin font-face(
  $font-name,
  $font-file,
  $font-weight: normal,
  $font-style: normal
) { /* ... */ }

Example

@include font-face('Museo', 'museo-sans-500');

Output

@font-face {
  font-family: "Museo";
  src: url("museo-sans-500.woff") format("woff"), url("museo-sans-500.woff2") format("woff2");
  font-weight: normal;
  font-style: normal;
}

font-size() mixin

Mixin that includes fallback px declaration and calculated rem value.

@mixin font-size(
  $size
) { /* ... */ }

Example

.foo {
   @include font-size(12px);
}

Output

.foo {
     font-size: 12px;
     font-size: 0.75rem;
 }

position() mixin

This mixin sets the position of an element.

@mixin position(
  $type: relative,
  $top: null,
  $right: null,
  $bottom: null,
  $left: null
) { /* ... */ }

Example

.foo {
   @include position(absolute, null null 10px 15px);
}

Output

.foo {
     position: absolute;
     bottom: 10px;
     left: 15px;
 }

size() mixin

Mixin to size an element. This mixin sets width and height for an element.

@mixin size(
  $width,
  $height: $width
) { /* ... */ }

Example

.foo {
  @include size(100px);
}

Output

.foo {
  width: 100px;
  height: 100px;
}

Example

.bar {
  @include size(400px, 300px);
}

Output

.bar {
  width: 400px;
  height: 300px;
}

triangle() mixin

Mixin for creating triangles. This mixin creates triangles should be used on a pseudo element.

@mixin triangle(
  $direction:,
  $color,
  $size
) { /* ... */ }

Example

.foo {
   @include triangle(down, 1em, #4fade3);
}

Output

.foo {
     top: 100%;
     left: 1em;
     position: absolute;
     width: 0;
     height: 0;
     content: '';
     z-index: 2;
     border-top: 1.5em solid #3498db;
     border-left: 1em solid transparent;
     border-right: 1em solid transparent;
 }
